originalText.text: I love all the styles which cover every aspect from sexy to bridal . The service I experienced particularly with Evelyn was a dream. My pre order was not going to arrive in time and she assisted me promptly with a solution. A reputable company . I will order from them again and again!! 5 star service all the way !! Superb team!! Thank you üôè

originalText.text: My daughter from an Asian descent was hired as an intern for 3 days. She went to work 10 mins early ahead of her scheduled time and was not introduced to the team when she walked in. She was basically left to fend for herself and was treated like garbage. She felt ignored and no one was keen to talk to her. They definitely made her feel she didn‚Äôt belong there!! She was so so excited to work here! How can this company be so racist? Is there accountability from anyone? She deserves an apology

originalText.text: The quality of Bronx and Banco's clothing is second to none. Their attention to detail and commitment to style is evident in every stitch.

originalText.text: Only offices and on appointments only. Wish this was explicitly explained on your google page before coming to visit the store.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve emailed this company numerous times about an order that was never received and I have gotten no response from anyone within the company and it has been extremely rude and unprofessional. The order was processed and my card was charged but the order has still not shipped out yet while there is no estimated arrival date or shipment. Furthermore since the brand is a luxury brand, they should have customer service and answer emails in a timely manner as I‚Äôve paid for product I have not yet received. Not to mention, The phone number provided on their website is an invalid number and does not work. I think the style of the dresses are interesting and fun but really not practical. The quality is subpar for the price that you‚Äôre paying but there‚Äôs really not much out there. All in all, I think this company needs some serious help because this is not how you run a business or a brand. Note to potential clients: do not buy from the website.
